ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: What game features would you like to see added?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... there ... it s ... Yes. The higher up you go sometimes even greens can kill you if you happen to get unlucky. My main can t even solo a light blue if he
ygData.messageBody:
> > I agree with you there. I can see losing the exp, but I hate trying
> > to find my corpse and get all my gear back. I got slapped last night
> > by Choon (which conned white to me) so I thought I could kill him.
> > Died about a minute later and paid heck trying to find my corpse.
> Yes, it would make me VERY happy if they would get rid of that part... the
> searching for the corpse.
> Side note though... has anyone noticed that the higher level you are,
there
> is a difference in what cons you can kill? For example, when you start off
it's
> usually not to hard to kill things that con white but as you get up in lvl
> sometimes even things that con blue can be hard.
>
Yes. The higher up you go sometimes even greens can kill you if you happen
to get unlucky. My main can't even solo a light blue if he can't get spells
off. Hell, at lvl 52 he got owned by Kizdean Gix in West Commons (well,
almost owned, had to run tot he zone) bc the little fucker resisted all of
my stuns and nukes, broke free of root less than a second after it was cast,
and interrupted all my spells even when he missed me. The higher level you
get the more you run into mobs that have more HP/AC and abilities than a
player of the same level. Like lvl 40 enchanter mobs with 3k hp.
luv,
-Su
